Producer: Gail Egan, Andrea Calderwood, Bertrand Calderwood
Screenwriter: Alison Deegan, Alan Rickman, Jeremy Brock
Synopsis: In 17th-century France, King Louis XIV's chief landscape architect (Matthias Schoenaerts) makes an unusual decision to hire a woman (Kate Winslet) to create a lavish garden at Versailles.
Title: A Little Chaos
